name: European Luxury Cars
description:
Choose your favorite european luxury car and drive with friends (MULTIPLAYER) or alone through island.

* You have fully controll of your car:
Open/Close doors,Adjust Air Suspension,ON/OFF engine also (ABS,ESP,TCS).etc.
* Also you can customize your car like you want:
Spoiler,Wheels,Bumpers or Speakers in trunk ? Everything is possible.
Now you can choose drive physics : Racing,Simulator or Drift mode

After Tuning you should take pic of your car via Photo Mode or Drone Mode and share with your friends.

If you are bored with driving on roads you can easily change regular or sport car to OFF ROAD BEAST.

This game iclude lot of cars and more will come !!!,many game controlls,Repair Shops,Gas Stations,CarWash,Day-Night Cycle, Car Trailers and many more FEATURES.

Write me email me what you want me to add.
